title: Italy : largest rivers in 2018 , by length
summary: This is a bar chart representing Rivers In Italy in the x axis and Lenght in kilometers in the y axis.
Rivers In Italy Po has the highest Lenght in kilometers and Reno has the lowest Lenght in kilometers.
There is a difference of 441.0 between the maximum Rivers In Italy Po and minimum Rivers In Italy Reno.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Rivers In Italy in the x axis and Lenght in kilometers in the y axis.
The maximum Lenght in kilometers 652.0 is found at Rivers In Italy Po and the minimum is found at Reno where Rivers In Italy is 211.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Rivers In Italy in the x axis and Lenght in kilometers in the y axis.
Rivers In Italy Po has the highest Lenght in kilometers and Reno has the lowest Lenght in kilometers.
There is a difference of 441.0 between the maximum Rivers In Italy Po and minimum Rivers In Italy Reno.
max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Rivers In Italy, and Lenght in kilometers in each Rivers In Italy on the y axis.
Rivers In Italy Po has the highest Lenght in kilometers and Reno has the lowest Lenght in kilometers.
The second highest Lenght in kilometers is appeared to be the Rivers In Italy Adige.
Rivers In Italy Po has 3.09 times more Lenght in kilometers than Rivers In Italy Reno which is has the lowest.
Rivers In Italy Po is higher than any other Rivers In Italys with value 652.0, followed by Adige, and Tevere. Down to Rivers In Italy Reno with the lowest value 211.0.
The average Lenght in kilometers in all 10 Rivers In Italys is 325.6.
The Lenght in kilometers is 3256.0 if we add up values of all Rivers In Italys.
